messages.message: The Cypress ICC sandbox should contain all my changes to fix the `GetMountPoints` endpoint. From the Jaeger trace (https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/grafana/goto/3m0jaQPHR?orgId=1), we are no longer querying all ~400 data sources into memory (ss1), and the number of perm checks is a constant (ss2). CPS memory usage so far seems stable (ss3), compared to the spike yesterday at 460MiB (ss4). The sandbox should hopefully not get OOM-killed again. Hoping that Cypress CI gets better today :crossed_fingers:
